## Load example file
  
```{r}
anno <- exampleSRA()
```
 
Extract only for example naked mole rat

```{r}
nmr <- anno %>% filter(Organism=="Heterocephalus glaber") %>%
       select(Run) %>% unlist() %>% as.character()
```
